items.question: What is GERARD?
items.answer: GERARD (Generative Research And Rapid Development) is an AI-powered R&D platform that combines synthetic persona simulation, multi-agent research orchestration, and the GEORadar intelligence engine to deliver enterprise-grade market research 10x faster and at 10x lower cost than traditional methods.

items.question: How does GERARD relate to GEORadar?
items.answer: GERARD is built on top of 498AS's GEORadar platform, which monitors 15+ LLM models and provides 8 proprietary metrics for Generative Engine Optimization. GERARD extends this capability into market research, competitive intelligence, and synthetic persona simulation.

items.question: Are synthetic personas reliable?
items.answer: Yes. GERARD's synthetic personas are not random AI generationâ€”they're validated against real demographic data and behavioral patterns. Every synthetic insight includes a confidence score, and we offer hybrid validation with real sample confirmation for critical decisions.

items.question: Is GERARD GDPR compliant?
items.answer: Absolutely. GERARD is EU-hosted (AWS Frankfurt), GDPR-compliant by design, with PII redaction capabilities and alignment with EU AI Act requirements. We serve regulated industries including banking and healthcare.

items.question: What's the typical project cost?
items.answer: Projects range from â‚¬5K-â‚¬35K depending on scope, compared to $50K-$200K for traditional research firms. We also offer monthly subscriptions starting at â‚¬1,500/month for ongoing research needs.

items.question: How fast can I get results?
items.answer: Most research projects deliver validated insights within 24-48 hours. Complex, multi-phase studies may take 3-5 days. Compare this to the 4-8 weeks typical of traditional research firms.

items.question: Can GERARD integrate with our existing tools?
items.answer: Yes. GERARD offers REST API access, Slack integration for alerts, PDF report generation, and can export to common BI tools. Enterprise customers get dedicated integration support.

items.question: Who is 498AS?
items.answer: 498AS is the Barcelona-based technology company behind GERARD, GEORadar, and the complete GEO Suite. We serve enterprise clients including major Spanish banks, media companies, and retail brands. Learn more at 498as.com.
